message: Let's start fair. I'll take the lion's share, but you get something too.  Accept this and we can both walk away with some money.
I think 60-40 is more than fair, considering the inflation hits you harder.
Let's split it down the middle.  It's better than both of us getting nothing.  If we keep going, inflation will only hurt me more.
Inflation is taking its toll on your share, I think 70-30 is a reasonable split now.
I'm willing to go down to 40% to avoid further losses. This is a fair compromise given the inflation.
You're losing value fast, I think 75-25 is more than generous at this point.
I'm taking a big hit with inflation, but I'm still willing to negotiate.  This is my final offer.  If we don't agree, we both get nothing.
